summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1690, for the improvement of Thorndyke Avenue, from West Bertona Street to Emerson Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, by constructing sewers therein, together with all inlets, manholes, catch basins, septic tanks and temporary outfalls and other appurtenances that may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 17787, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
